meanings.definition: The state of being separate or distinct.
meanings.sent1: The severalties between the two countries were clear.
meanings.sent2: The severalties in opinions led to a productive discussion.
meanings.sent3: The severalties in tastes made for an interesting dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The severalties in personalities created a dynamic team.
meanings.sent5: The severalties in colors made the painting vibrant.

meanings.definition: The separate ownership of property by different individuals.
meanings.sent1: The severalties of the houses in the neighborhood were evident.
meanings.sent2: The severalties of the land caused some disputes.
meanings.sent3: The severalties of the cars parked outside showed diversity.
meanings.sent4: The severalties of the businesses brought competition.
meanings.sent5: The severalties of the books on the shelf reflected individuality.
